Package io.smudgr.util.source.graph

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edge
    The Edge class represents a set of two connected Vertex instances, with a configurable opacity and an extra 'weight' parameter (for GraphAlgorithm usage).
    Graph
    The Graph class represents a collection of 2D Shape instances, Vertex instances, and Edge instances to be acted upon by GraphAlgorithm classes and rendered by a GraphRenderer
    GraphRenderer
    The GraphRenderer class uses Java libraries to draw the Vertex, Edge, and Shape components of a Graph onto a PixelFrame
    GraphSource
    The GraphSource implementation represents a Source that returns rendered frames of a Graph
    Shape
    The Shape class represents a container of Vertex instances, with specified fill properties like RGB and opacity.
    Vertex
    The Vertex class represents an arbitrary 2d point in space.
